text.p: Heartsoft Inc said Friday it terminated merger negotiations with Micro-Lan Solutions Inc after a review of its financial position revealed that the proposed acquisition offered neither a net margin nor asset base to which Heartsoft had originally been exposed.

"While we are still intrigued by the business activities of Micro-Lan, Heartsoft's plan of expansion allows for the development of new business methodologies which fit a strict financial model," the company explained.
"Once we had completed our due diligence of Micro-Lan's financial position, it became clear that they did not fit our model at this time."
The company said it will continue with the development of new educational software products to be released under the Heartsoft name over the next 12 months.
"Corporately, we are reviewing other product or corporate acquisitions which fit Heartsoft's long-term expansion plans."
The company also said that it will release current financial statements which have been held, due to the pending acquisition of Micro-Lan.
